To speed up the whole sequence effectively, try these edits:

1. Trim down any pauses or lingering shots that don’t add crucial information.
2. Use faster cuts between scenes or angles, reducing shot lengths by about 20-30%.
3. Apply jump cuts within longer actions to maintain momentum.
4. Where appropriate, use quick crossfades or fast swipes to transition smoothly without slowing pacing.
5. Remove or shorten establishing shots that aren’t essential to the story.

These actions will make the sequence feel more dynamic and engaging without losing clarity.
